name: Service Factory
overview:
Service Factory AB develops and supplies Internet services and access management systems for broadband network operators and service providers in Europe, Japan, and China. It offers system architecture, service management, accounting, authentication and roaming, system controller, access gateway, and wireless systems and services, as well as subscriber access services. The company also provides technologies and services, including mobile office, voice over Internet protocol, and WiMAX, as well as supports roaming and integrates with GSM, GPRS, and UMTS. In addition, it offers planning and design services, such as business applications/modelling, design and creation, customer behaviour, development/engineering/customization, and network design and planning; implementation and integration services, including system integration, planning, implementation, and network analysis and optimization; operation and life cycle services, such as managed services, operations support, security, business continuity and recovery, business hour support, swap repair service/hot standby swap repair, and maintenance services; and education and training services.

The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden. As of January 3, 2011, Service Factory AB operates as a subsidiary of Aptilo Networks AB.

acquisition.source_description: Aptilo Networks to Acquire Service Factory ; Announces Investment by Norvestor
